name: American USA Flag Print Unisex Skinny Jeans
description:
The stars and stripes print is definitely in fashion this season so why not own 1 of only 100 pairs, of Tivo & Roxx skinny jeans, available in the UK. These flag jeans give maximum movement and flexibility as they are made from 98% Cotton and 2% Spandex. Unlike the majority of American USA flag merchandise currently available these have a muted colour palette of red and blue with a patchy effect creating an edgy, vintage feel. - LIMITED EDITION ONLY 100 PAIRS AVAILABLE IN THE UK - 

28          = UK 6 
28W 32L = UK 8 
29W 32L = UK 10 
30W 32L = UK 12 
32W 32L = UK 14 
33W 32L = UK 16 
34W 32L = UK 18

Machine Washable. Tumble Dry Low. Warm Iron If Needed. Do Not Bleach

name: Union Jack Flag Print Unisex Skinny Jeans
description:
These raspberry red and navy, vintage effect, Union Jack skinnies are the perfect jeans. Last year celebrated Britain's Heritage by hosting the Queen's Diamond Jubilee and various 2012 sporting events these could not be more in fashion. There has never been a more appropriate time for them! Dress them up with a pair heels and a blazer or wear casually with a vintage cardigan and pumps however you choose to wear them, they are THE jeans to be caught in. Unlike many skinny jeans they give maximum movement and flexibility as they are made from 98% Cotton and 2% Spandex. - LIMITED EDITION. LIMITED STOCK AVAILABLE IN THE UK - 

Conversion to Women's UK sizes
28 = UK 6 
28W 32L = UK 8 
29W 32L = UK 10 
30W 32L = UK 12 
32W 32L = UK 14 
33W 32L = UK 16 
34W 32L = UK 18

Garment Care
Machine Washable. Tumble Dry Low. Warm Iron If Needed. Do Not Bleach
